elements.name: LandingIntroText01
elements.html: You're here because the disease of laryngeal paralysis (LarPar, LP) or Geriatric-Onset Laryngeal Paralysis and Polyneuropathy (GOLPP) has touched your life.

elements.name: LandingIntroText
elements.html: The LP/GOLPP journey is a learning process, and at the beginning people often have more questions than answers. This survey has two modes. Which mode you chose depends on how far long on your LP/GOLPP journey you are:

elements.name: LandingIntroText02
elements.html:
• Survey Mode is designed to collect information from people who are not new to the LP/GOLPP journey. If you've already been faced with making choices for your beloved LarPar companion and would like to share your experience, select Survey Mode.
  • Workbook Mode presents people with a framework of choices they'll need to make as they move forward on their LP/GOLPP journey. If you're new to the LP/GOLPP journey and want to inform yourself about how to proceed, select Workbook Mode

elements.name: LandingJourneyText
elements.html: In Survey Mode you'll be asked to remember details about your LP/GOLPP journey. If you find yourself answering 'Don't know' to many of the questions, you can switch to Workbook Mode to refresh your memory and continue later.

elements.name: LandingLosingCompanion
elements.html: We know how hard it is to lose one's beloved companion. If your companion has recently crossed over the Rainbow Bridge, maybe it's best to do the survey later when you've had time to heal.

elements.name: LandingAboutPrivacyText01
elements.html: We're not asking for your last name, so we have no way to connect you with any of your private data. We need only four pieces of information to verify survey results:

elements.name: LandingAboutPrivacyText02
elements.html:
• Your first name
  • Your companion animal's name
  • The country in which you live
  • Your email address or Facebook account name

elements.name: LandingAboutPrivacyText02
elements.html: With this info, we can ensure that all the survey respondents are unique and verifiable without having to collect any information that makes you identifiable outside the context of the survey. For details about how we'll use the data we collect and further steps we'll take to anonymize your contact information, select the 'About your privacy' and 'Consent information' links.
